mapper.insert: insert into user(name, username, age, sex, phone, address, account) values(#{name}, #{username}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{account})
mapper.update: update user set name = #{name}, age = #{age}, sex = #{sex}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, account = #{account}, status = #{status}, updatetime = #{updatetime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from user
name like concat('%', #{ name }, '%')
and phone like concat('%', #{ phone }, '%')
order by id desc
